XIII.i.6.1.k
.
Notification to a Veteran or Service Member of a Retroactive Lump-Sum Payment
If payment of a retroactive lump sum is in order, inform the Veteran or service member in the decision notice
of the reason for the retroactive payment, and
how it was calculated.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6 - Medal of Honor Pension (MOHP)
